category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_ENABLE_BOMEDIT_TRACKING
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether BOM edits are created automatically while modifying solution structure or not. Valid Values: * true: BOM edits are created for modifications such as adding or removing children or changing quantities made to the solution Items of the current change context. This is the default value. * false: BOM edits are not created.
